languages.text: [Выхватить оружие] "Хватит болтать. Я услышал{mf||а} достаточно ереси".
[Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I will not listen to another word of this heresy."
languages.original_text: [Выхватить оружие] "Хватит болтать. Я услышал{mf||а} достаточно ереси".

traits.locale_text: [Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I have heard enough of this heresy."

languages.text: [拔出武器]“废话到此为止，我没兴趣继续听你的异端邪说。”
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I will not listen to another word of this heresy."

traits.locale_text: [拔出武器]“废话到此为止，我没兴趣继续听你的异端邪说。”

languages.text: [Sacar tu arma] «Basta de cháchara. No escucharé una sola herejía más».
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I will not listen to another word of this heresy."

traits.locale_text: [Sacar tu arma] «Basta de cháchara. No escucharé una sola herejía más».

languages.text: [Silahını çek] "Bu kadar konuştuğumuz yeter. Bu kâfirliğin tek kelimesini daha dinlemeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I will not listen to another word of this heresy."

traits.locale_text: [Silahını çek] "Bu kadar konuştuğumuz yeter. Bu kâfirliğin tek kelimesini daha dinlemeyeceğim."

languages.text: [武器を構える]「おしゃべりはそこまでだ。この異端者の言葉をこれ以上聞くつもりはない」
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I will not listen to another word of this heresy."

traits.locale_text: [武器を構える]「おしゃべりはそこまでだ。この異端者の言葉をこれ以上聞くつもりはない」

languages.text: [Dégainer votre arme] « Assez parlé. Je refuse d'écouter une hérésie de plus. »
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I will not listen to another word of this heresy."

traits.locale_text: [Dégainer votre arme] « Assez parlé. Je refuse d'écouter une hérésie de plus. »

languages.text: [Deine Waffe ziehen] "Genug geredet. Ich höre mir kein weiteres Wort dieser Ketzerei an."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Enough talk. I will not listen to another word of this heresy."
